description: This file provides dependency functions for user authentication within a FastAPI web application, including a placeholder for retrieving the current user from request headers and a dependency for requiring authentication.

methods.name: str get_current_user(x_user_id: Optional[str] = Header(default=None, alias="X-User-Id"))
methods.description: Reads the X-User-Id header to identify the current user, defaulting to 'anonymous' if not provided. It's a placeholder for authentication logic.

methods.name: str require_auth(user_id: str = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: A dependency that depends on get_current_user and could be extended to enforce authentication.
